timeline.bodyText: Why does this StandardArgumentDefinitions us "--" but the next one for OUTPUT_SHORT_NAME uses only "-".
timeline.author: fleharty

replies.bodyText: Short names use -, long names use --.  It just happens that the short and long names for sequence dictionary are the same for the CNV plotting tools, but this line of code would've broken if that was ever changed.
replies.author: samuelklee
